title: Dalcon Constructors

  - /img/cover.png
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $567.7K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Dalcon Constructors. The average
  contract duration was 0.71 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $949.3K. The longest
  contract was 1.39 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $1.7M.
lookup_name: 'DALCON CONSTRUCTORS'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '567.7K'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '6'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '5'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '83%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '-10%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.2'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '-1.1M'
s424_mean_duration: '0.71'
s421_mean_contract_value: '949.3K'
s425_max_duration: '1.39'
s422_max_contract_value: '1.7M'
